overview:
Pricegalli.com - Check out who is quoting the lowest price in your city !!

We all know that negotiations are an important aspect of all purchases being made by the average Indian consumer and we buyers tend to get lost in traffic trying to figure out who in our city is stocking the product we wish to buy and above all haggling for prices everywhere. Buying a product in India has become such a tedious and time consuming process. Whew!

Pricegalli.com is a local product search engine, which allows buyer to view products, read reviews and also check out who quotes the best price in their city.

Pricegalli.com provides buyers with a FREE service using which they can get quotations from sellers across their city at a click of a button and as a bonus pricegalli.com uses an auto negotiation procedure (using part reverse auction) which ensures that our buyers get the best possible prices in their city.

The buyer does not buy from the site, pricegalli.com informs the buyer where to buy the product from. In other words they are your local shopping assistant !!

So if you are looking to buy a Mobile Phone, Computer, Electonic, Home Appliance, Gaming Product or Kitchen Ware, why waste time traveling across the city and haggling for prices when they do it for you for FREE!!

Maintaining a superior level of customer service requires Pricegalli.com to listen and respond to the needs of its buyers and make changes in the prices accordingly and thatâ€™s what they exactly do.

Start saving time and money for FREE, just log on to Pricegalli.com - A home to hot deals !!
